text:
PalleTech | Embedded Systems Engineer | San Francisco | Full-Time ONSITE | www.palletech.co

Current supply chain technology sorely needs a makeover. We're building the next generation cargo monitoring solutions. We're a heavily hardware and low level software focused company. Come and help us resolve true IoT challenges where power and connectivity are at a premium.

Feel free to reach me at: anthony [at] palletech.co

https://angel.co/palletech/jobs/204097-embedded-systems-engi...
